text: Now's your chance to attack, Kris! Press the menu button and hit Loki with a Heavy Blow!
Ow, that really hurts!
Nice! The damage you dealt will lower your enemies' HP.

If you're in a situation where attacking is unwise, you can guard instead. By doing so you will adopt a defensive stance and reduce any incoming damage in the following turn. But for now, just finish Loki off! End your turn first, and attack him with a Heavy Blow again on your next one!
Perfect! It looks like you're ready to start your adventure, Kris.
That was actually pretty easy!
Well... Skathian troops have been spotted all over, so it’s dangerous to go alone!
Take Bowie with you. He's up north trying to hunt us some rabbits. Go ahead!
Okay! I won't let our village down!
That's it Kris, you're getting the hang of it! Now... See those pesky Bobas coming our way? Try to get rid of them too.
I'm on it!
Kris, you are the best scout of Haki. You were selected by the elders' council to go see what's happening in Tyrmyr.
The caravan with the aid meant for our village from the Capital should have arrived already, and we're running low on resources...
I understand and I am honored. I'll go see what happened right away!
Alright, but first let’s take a moment to review the basics.
Hey loser, nice ponytail! Why don't you come closer so you can hit me?
What's the matter, are you scared?
You remember your rival Loki, right? It seems he's quite upset he wasn't the one picked by the council, but he will serve to help us refresh your training!
Try moving closer to Loki. Blue tiles are the spots you can reach, but for now just go to the spot I marked for you in Yellow!
Is that all? With that dinky sword you gotta come closer to me, right?
Characters with different weapon types can attack within different ranges, but as a Swordsman, you need to move really close in order to land a hit.
If I were you, I would just give up. Go home and bleach your roots, creep! I'll be the hero instead!
I think Loki deserves to be taught a lesson, Kris...
You couldn't make it all the way to him on a single turn. Press the menu button and end your turn, then when it's your turn again, move right in front of him!
